tag_list: personalised, mac, windows, adobe, help, technical-support, design, finished-art, desktop-publishing, training, computer-usage, graphics, publishing-packages
overview:
Simon Barnett is an advanced light and sound processing unit.

Using his sensors and processor, he constantly processes and interprets raw or pre-processed audiovisual data.

Occasionally he is utilised by administrative units who require such processing.

In return they supply credit tokens used to purchase energy packages which allow Simon Barnett to continue to provide processing services.

In order for other units to locate Simon they interface with a vast network where a surplus of other units similar to Simon are awaiting implementation.

Simon Barnett must initiate a pre-emptive autonomous upgrade task to ensure he is optimally situated in the database to be detected by administrative units requiring advanced processors.

In standard system protocol, Simon’s services are identified with the following tags:
